summary: Tested all Lote 1 features: exercise_notes field, exercise reordering, enhanced athlete home screen, edit/delete physical tests. Backend: 9/9 tests passed. Frontend: All features verified working.
seed_data_creation: Used existing test accounts: trainer_lote1@test.com and athlete_lote1@test.com with password test1234
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Lote 1 features fully implemented and tested. Exercise notes (exercise_notes) field works in add-workout and edit-workout screens. Exercise reorder buttons (chevron-up/chevron-down) visible and functional in edit-workout. Athlete home screen shows workout statuses (Por hacer badge visible). Tests tab has edit (pencil) and delete (trash) icons with functional edit modal. Bilateral tests show IZQ/DER fields in edit modal.

exercise_notes_tests.POST /api/workouts with exercise_notes: ✓ PASS - Creates workout with exercise_notes preserved

exercise_reordering_tests.PUT /api/workouts reorders exercises: ✓ PASS - Array order is updated correctly
exercise_reordering_tests.GET /api/workouts verifies new order: ✓ PASS - New order persisted in database

add_workout_screen.exercise_notes_editable: ✓ VERIFIED - Can fill in exercise notes
add_workout_screen.video_url_input: ✓ VERIFIED - URL de video field present

edit_workout_screen.reorder_buttons_visible: ✓ VERIFIED - Chevron up/down arrows on left of exercises

athlete_home_screen.workout_status_badges: ✓ VERIFIED - 'Por hacer' badge visible for pending workouts
athlete_home_screen.incompleto_badge: Present in code (for partially completed with skips)
athlete_home_screen.completion_bar: Present in code (shows % and series count)

tests_tab.edit_button_pencil: ✓ VERIFIED - create-outline icon visible on each test
tests_tab.delete_button_trash: ✓ VERIFIED - trash-outline icon visible on each test
tests_tab.edit_modal_opens: ✓ VERIFIED - 'Editar test' modal with VALOR, UNIDAD, NOTAS fields
tests_tab.edit_modal_bilateral: ✓ VERIFIED - Shows IZQ and DER fields for bilateral tests
tests_tab.delete_confirmation: Implemented via Alert.alert (native dialog in React Native)

bilateral_tests_display.izq_der_labels: ✓ VERIFIED - IZQ/DER badges with values displayed

features_tested_and_verified: Exercise notes (exercise_notes) field in add-workout form
Exercise notes loaded and editable in edit-workout form
Exercise reorder buttons (up/down arrows) in edit-workout
Athlete home shows 'Por hacer' status badge for pending workouts
Tests tab displays edit (pencil) and delete (trash) icons
Edit test modal opens with pre-filled values (VALOR, UNIDAD, NOTAS)
Bilateral test edit modal shows IZQ and DER fields
Backend PUT /api/tests/{id} updates test values correctly
Backend POST /api/tests creates bilateral tests with value_left/value_right
screenshots_captured: 05-07: Add workout screen with exercise_notes field
17-19: Edit workout screen with reorder buttons
26: Edit test modal (bilateral test with IZQ/DER)
